title: Investigate Unusual Biometric/Demographic Ratios
rationale: Detected 9 anomalies in biometric/demographic ratios. Unusual ratios may indicate process issues, data quality problems, or coverage gaps
expected_impact: Identify process improvements and data quality issues
action_items: Review enrollment process in affected areas
Investigate data collection and recording procedures
Check for systematic biases in enrollment
Analyze demographic vs biometric enrollment patterns
Review training needs for enrollment centers

title: Deploy Additional Resources to Uttar Pradesh
rationale: High-priority surge predicted with 1 surge event(s). Expected volume: 9,367,083, Magnitude: 7.23x normal
expected_impact: Prepare for 9,367,083 expected updates within 45-45 days

Begin resource allocation within 31 days

title: Pre-Surge Preparation Campaign in Uttar Pradesh
rationale: Surge predicted in Uttar Pradesh within 30-90 days. Pre-campaign can help prepare population and reduce surge impact
expected_impact: Prepare population for upcoming surge, potentially flattening the surge curve
action_items: Begin awareness campaign in Uttar Pradesh before surge hits
Encourage early enrollment to reduce surge volume
Set up pre-enrollment registration system
Provide information about required documents
Coordinate with local enrollment centers
